[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/challenge.rs] [Field: new_public_key] [Key validation] Does new_public_key undergo cryptographic validation (curve membership, non-zero), or can invalid keys be rotated to, locking accounts permanently? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/challenge.rs] [Fields: module_name/struct_name] [Type confusion] Can module_name or struct_name be manipulated to use RotationProofChallenge for unintended purposes beyond key rotation, enabling signature forgery? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/resources/pending_claims.rs] [Field: pending_claims] [Claim manipulation] Can pending_claims Table handle be manipulated to access or modify other users' pending token claims, enabling claim theft? (Critical)
